items/toxic_rose.effect: Whenever you restore health, give the enemy 1 poison. You can only equip 1 rose
items/toxic_rose.name: Toxic Rose

items/trail_mix.effect: Battle Start: Deal 1 damage and gain 1 Thorns (repeat twice)
items/trail_mix.name: Trail Mix

items/treebark_egg.effect: Hatches after you defeat the next boss (Into Liferoot Beast)
items/treebark_egg.name: Treebark Egg

items/twisted_root.effect: Exposed: Gain 1 regeneration for each equipped wood item
items/twisted_root.name: Twisted Root

items/underwater_watermelon.effect: Battle Start (if Exposed or Wounded): Decrease 1 random status and give enemy 1 Riptide
items/underwater_watermelon.name: Underwater Watermelon

items/vampire_s_tooth.effect: If you have exactly 1 sanguine item, double its healing
items/vampire_s_tooth.name: Vampire's Tooth

items/vampiric_stasis.effect: Whenever you skip your strike, restore 3 health
items/vampiric_stasis.name: Vampiric Stasis

items/venomous_fang.effect: First Turn: Give the enemy 2 poison on hit — at Gold: 4, at Diamond: 8
items/venomous_fang.name: Venomous Fang

items/viper_extract.effect: The first time the enemy gains poison, give them 3 additional poison
items/viper_extract.name: Viper Extract

items/weaver_armor.effect: Battle Start: If you have 0 base armor, gain armor equal to current health
items/weaver_armor.name: Weaver Armor

items/weaver_shield.effect: Battle Start: If you have 0 base armor, gain 4 armor — at Gold: 8, at Diamond: 16
items/weaver_shield.name: Weaver Shield

items/wet_egg.effect: Hatches after you defeat the next boss (Into Clearspring Duck)
items/wet_egg.name: Wet Egg

upgrades/armor_oil.effect: Apply to a weapon: +1 armor. One oil per weapon; refreshes if the weapon is changed.
upgrades/armor_oil.name: Armor Oil

upgrades/armor_oil_darkened.effect: Apply to a weapon: +1 armor. One oil per weapon; refreshes if the weapon is changed.
upgrades/armor_oil_darkened.name: Armor Oil Darkened

upgrades/armor_oil_used.effect: Apply to a weapon: +1 armor. One oil per weapon; refreshes if the weapon is changed.
upgrades/armor_oil_used.name: Armor Oil Used

upgrades/attack_oil.effect: Apply to a weapon: +1 attack. One oil per weapon; refreshes if the weapon is changed.
upgrades/attack_oil.name: Attack Oil

upgrades/attack_oil_darkened.effect: Apply to a weapon: +1 attack. One oil per weapon; refreshes if the weapon is changed.
upgrades/attack_oil_darkened.name: Attack Oil Darkened

upgrades/attack_oil_used.effect: Apply to a weapon: +1 attack. One oil per weapon; refreshes if the weapon is changed.
upgrades/attack_oil_used.name: Attack Oil Used

upgrades/blood_rune.effect: The first time the enemy becomes Wounded, trigger all of your Wounded items.
upgrades/blood_rune.name: Blood Rune

upgrades/cleansing_edge.effect: Ignore the first status effect you're afflicted with
upgrades/cleansing_edge.name: Cleansing Edge

upgrades/featherweight_edge.effect: On Hit: Convert 1 speed to 1 attack
upgrades/featherweight_edge.name: Featherweight Edge

upgrades/freezing_edge.effect: Battle Start: Give the enemy 3 freeze
upgrades/freezing_edge.name: Freezing Edge

upgrades/gilded_edge.effect: On Hit: If you have less than 10 gold, gain 1 gold
upgrades/gilded_edge.name: Gilded Edge

upgrades/jagged_edge.effect: On Hit: Gain 2 thorns and take 1 damage
upgrades/jagged_edge.name: Jagged Edge

upgrades/oozing_edge.effect: On Hit: If the enemy doesn't have any poison, give them 2 poison
upgrades/oozing_edge.name: Oozing Edge

upgrades/petrified_edge.effect: Double your attack. On Hit: Gain 1 stun
upgrades/petrified_edge.name: Petrified Edge

upgrades/plated_edge.effect: On Hit: Convert 1 speed to 3 armor
upgrades/plated_edge.name: Plated Edge

upgrades/stormcloud_edge.effect: Battle Start: Stun the enemy for 1 turn
upgrades/stormcloud_edge.name: Stormcloud Edge

upgrades/whirlpool_edge.effect: Every 3 strikes, give the enemy 1 riptide
upgrades/whirlpool_edge.name: Whirlpool Edge

weapons/ancient_warhammer.effect: On Hit: Remove all of the enemy's armor
weapons/ancient_warhammer.name: Ancient Warhammer

weapons/arcane_wand.effect: Can't attack. Turn Start: Deal 2 damage. Increase the damage by 1 for each tome equipped
weapons/arcane_wand.name: Arcane Wand

weapons/banish_hammer.effect: Battle Start: Remove all tomes from the enemy before they trigger.
weapons/banish_hammer.name: Banish Hammer

weapons/basilisk_fang.effect: On Hit: Decrease your poison by 2 and give it to the enemy
weapons/basilisk_fang.name: Basilisk Fang

weapons/battle_axe.effect: While the enemy has armor double your attack
weapons/battle_axe.name: Battle Axe

weapons/bearclaw_blade.effect: Attack is always equal to missing health
weapons/bearclaw_blade.name: Bearclaw Blade

weapons/bejeweled_blade.effect: Gain 2 attack for each equipped jewelry item
weapons/bejeweled_blade.name: Bejeweled Blade

weapons/blackbriar_blade.effect: Whenever you would gain thorns, gain 1 attack instead
weapons/blackbriar_blade.name: Blackbriar Blade

weapons/blackbriar_bow.effect: Can't strike. Turn Start: Gain thorns equal to your attack.
weapons/blackbriar_bow.name: Blackbriar Bow

weapons/bloodlord_s_axe.effect: Battle Start: The enemy loses 5 health and you restore 5 health
weapons/bloodlord_s_axe.name: Bloodlord's Axe

weapons/bloodmoon_dagger.effect: Wounded: Gain 5 attack and take 2 damage
weapons/bloodmoon_dagger.name: Bloodmoon Dagger

weapons/brittlebark_bow.effect: After 3 strikes: Lose 2 attack (Gold: after 4; Diamond: after 6).
weapons/brittlebark_bow.name: Brittlebark Bow

weapons/bubblegloop_staff.effect: Can't strike. Turn Start: Spend 1 speed to give the enemy 2 acid and 2 poison
weapons/bubblegloop_staff.name: Bubblegloop Staff

weapons/chainmail_sword.effect: Exposed: Gain armor equal to base armor
weapons/chainmail_sword.name: Chainmail Sword

weapons/cherry_blade.effect: Battle Start: Reduce your speed by 1. After each strike: Restore 1 health.
weapons/cherry_blade.name: Cherry Blade

weapons/dashmaster_s_dagger.effect: Battle Start: Gain additional strikes equal to speed
weapons/dashmaster_s_dagger.name: Dashmaster's Dagger

weapons/evergrowth_spear.effect: Every other turn, gain 1 attack and restore 1 health
weapons/evergrowth_spear.name: Evergrowth Spear

weapons/explosive_sword.effect: Whenever a bomb deals 5 or more non-weapon damage, gain 1 additional strike.
weapons/explosive_sword.name: Explosive Sword

weapons/forge_hammer.effect: On Hit: Give the enemy 2 armor.
weapons/forge_hammer.name: Forge Hammer

weapons/frostbite_dagger.effect: First turn: Give the enemy freeze equal to your attack on hit
weapons/frostbite_dagger.name: Frostbite Dagger

weapons/gemstone_scepter.effect: Gains On Hit effects from emerald, ruby, sapphire, and citrine items
weapons/gemstone_scepter.name: Gemstone Scepter

weapons/granite_axe.effect: On Hit: Lose 2 health and gain 4 armor
weapons/granite_axe.name: Granite Axe

weapons/granite_hammer.effect: On Hit: Convert 1 armor to 2 attack
weapons/granite_hammer.name: Granite Hammer

weapons/grindstone_club.effect: The next weapon you equip gains 2 attack
weapons/grindstone_club.name: Grindstone Club

weapons/hidden_dagger.effect: Gets stronger for every new hidden dagger you find
weapons/hidden_dagger.name: Hidden Dagger

weapons/icicle_spear.effect: Exposed: Give the enemy 2 freeze for each equipped water item
weapons/icicle_spear.name: Icicle Spear

weapons/ironstone_bow.effect: On Hit: Lose 1 speed. If your speed is 0 or less, only strike every other turn
weapons/ironstone_bow.name: Ironstone Bow

weapons/ironstone_spear.effect: While you have armor, temporarily gain 2 attack.
weapons/ironstone_spear.name: Ironstone Spear

weapons/king_s_blade.effect: Exposed and Wounded items triggers at battle start instead
weapons/king_s_blade.name: King's Blade

weapons/knight_s_blade.effect: Upgrades after you defeat the next boss.
weapons/knight_s_blade.name: Knight's Blade

weapons/lakebed_sword.effect: Gain double health and attack from purity
weapons/lakebed_sword.name: Lakebed Sword

weapons/lifeblood_spear.effect: Whenever you restore 3 or more health, gain 1 attack
weapons/lifeblood_spear.name: Lifeblood Spear

weapons/liferoot_hammer.effect: On Hit: If your health is full, spend your regeneration to gain 3 times that amount of armor
weapons/liferoot_hammer.name: Liferoot Hammer

weapons/lifesteal_scythe.effect: On Hit: If the enemy doesn't have any armor, restore health equal to your attack
weapons/lifesteal_scythe.name: Lifesteal Scythe

weapons/lightning_rod.effect: Turn Start: If you're stunned, gain 3 attack
weapons/lightning_rod.name: Lightning Rod

weapons/lightning_whip.effect: Turn Start: If the enemy is stunned, gain 1 additional strike
weapons/lightning_whip.name: Lightning Whip

weapons/moonlight_cleaver.effect: While you are below 50% health, you cannot gain status effects
weapons/moonlight_cleaver.name: Moonlight Cleaver

weapons/mountain_cleaver.effect: Attack always is equal to base armor
weapons/mountain_cleaver.name: Mountain Cleaver

weapons/pacifist_staff.effect: On Hit: Gain 1 armor and restore 1 health
weapons/pacifist_staff.name: Pacifist Staff

weapons/purelake_staff.effect: Battle Start: Gain 2 purity. On Hit: Remove 1 purity
weapons/purelake_staff.name: Purelake Staff

weapons/ring_blades.effect: Battle Start: Steal 1 attack from the enemy
weapons/ring_blades.name: Ring Blades

weapons/riverflow_rapier.effect: The first time you gain a new status effect, gain 1 additional strike as well
weapons/riverflow_rapier.name: Riverflow Rapier

weapons/royal_scepter.effect: Attack is always equal to gold. You cannot have more than 10 gold
weapons/royal_scepter.name: Royal Scepter

weapons/rusty_sword.effect: First Turn: Give acid equal to your attack on hit
weapons/rusty_sword.name: Rusty Sword

weapons/serpent_dagger.effect: Every 3 strikes, give the enemy 4 poison
weapons/serpent_dagger.name: Serpent Dagger

weapons/silverscale_dagger.effect: Battle Start: Give the enemy 1 riptide
weapons/silverscale_dagger.name: Silverscale Dagger

weapons/silverscale_trident.effect: On Hit: Give the enemy 1 riptide
weapons/silverscale_trident.name: Silverscale Trident

weapons/slime_sword.effect: Battle Start: Give yourself and the enemy 3 acid
weapons/slime_sword.name: Slime Sword

weapons/squire_s_blade.effect: Upgrades after you defeat the next boss
weapons/squire_s_blade.name: Squire's Blade

weapons/stormcloud_spear.effect: Every 5 strikes, stun the enemy for 2 turns
weapons/stormcloud_spear.name: Stormcloud Spear

weapons/swiftstrike_bow.effect: Whenever you gain an additional strike, gain twice as many
weapons/swiftstrike_bow.name: Swiftstrike Bow

weapons/swiftstrike_rapier.effect: Battle Start: If you have more speed than the enemy, gain 3 additional strikes
weapons/swiftstrike_rapier.name: Swiftstrike Rapier

weapons/sword_of_pride.effect: Battle Start: If the enemy has more attack, armor or speed than you, take 3 damage
weapons/sword_of_pride.name: Sword of Pride

weapons/tempest_blade.effect: Attack always is equal to speed
weapons/tempest_blade.name: Tempest Blade

weapons/thunderbound_sabre.effect: Battle start: Stun yourself for 2 turns
weapons/thunderbound_sabre.name: Thunderbound Sabre

weapons/wave_breaker.effect: Can't strike. Battle Start: Give the enemy 2 riptide for each negative base attack you have.
weapons/wave_breaker.name: Wave Breaker

weapons/woodcutter_s_axe.effect: Wounded: Gain 6 attack until the end of the turn.
weapons/woodcutter_s_axe.name: Woodcutter's Axe
